Uses of Class
org.ensembl.datamodel.Location

Packages that use Location
org.ensembl.compara.datamodel Data types that are unique to ensembl compara databases such as Homology and GenomicAlign. 
org.ensembl.compara.driver Compara adaptors. 
org.ensembl.datamodel Data types that appear in the core ensembl databases such as Genes, Exons and Karyotypes and various support classes such as Location. 
org.ensembl.driver Driver and adaptors for accessing ensembl core databases. 
org.ensembl.variation.driver Driver and adaptors for accessing ensembl variation databases.

Subclasses of Location in org.ensembl.datamodel
 class AssemblyLocation
          Deprecated. Create instances of Location directly. The specific location types such as AssemblyLocation have been superseded by the more generic Location class.
 class CloneFragmentLocation
          Location on a Contig (Clone Fragment).
